name: Android & iOS Keyboards Kit
description:
This is a keyboard library with complete support of variants and auto-layout which you can use it for prototype and designs.


In this library you can see:

  • Android & iOS native keyboard
  • Dark & Light mode 
  • Emoji keyboard
  • Dictation mode
  • Numeric keyboard
  • Alphabetic Keyboard with 13 languages (English - Persian - Russian - Arabic - Dutch - German - Italian - Portuguese - Turkish...)


Update 14 May 2022:

In this version, we synced library with the recent Figma update.

  • Update Auto Layout to new ver.
  • Update Component to the new structure
  • Update Texts


Update 29 Mar 2022:

  • Update RTL Texts


Update 6 Nov 2021:

  • Added new language (Polish)
  • Fixed performance issues


Update 20 Jul 2020:

  • Added 3 new languages (Hebrew - France - Finnish)


In coming:

Samsung Keyboard

Landscape Mode

Hindi Language
